m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model X -- 10 Videos, Bunch of Facts, Bunch of Pics | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Thanks. andrew eatough It’s an SUV but how do you put a bike rack on the roof with falcon doors? I would love an EV SUV but it has to do typical SUV stuff such as carry things on roof racks. http://zacharyshahan.com/ Zachary Shahan Tesla offers a bike rack for the back that takes ~5 seconds to put on. And that will have better aerodynamics. Pretty simple and better solution. Bob_Wallace Anyone else notice this under the ModX spec list on Tesla’s site? “Free long distance travel on Tesla’s expanding Supercharger network (Emphasis mine….)
